consent.title: Welcome to Olympics Pilot Tug-of-War
content: Tug-of-war tournament judgments (strength/effort/prediction) plus end-of-study commentary.
This experiment should take about 20 minutes.
Your participation is completely voluntary. You can agree to take part and later change your mind.

content.value: In each trial you will see a small tug-of-war tournament. Teams are shown on either side, and the crown marks the winner of each game.
Player strength stays constant across games, but effort can vary. You will answer several sliders about player strength/effort and predict a future match.
After the trials, you will be asked to write one sentence of commentary about a scenario you saw that could change someoneâ€™s belief about the players.
